title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets: Detailed Report on Recent Attacks and Countermeasures”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked several targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization.

A short while ago, the Air Force fighter jets attacked several targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization, including terror infrastructure, a launching pad, and a military building.

In addition, earlier today, IDF soldiers identified and attacked terrorists in a known area of the Hezbollah terrorist organization.

Also, several launches from Lebanese territory towards several areas on the Lebanese border were identified. Following the alerts of a plane’s penetration in the north, the alarm was activated due to launches from Lebanese territory.

The IDF attacked the sources of the fire with artillery.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/476G9EV
